text:
It's getting lively...!
Chiyuki, let's do our best...!

I was just thinking about the people who come
to the live. They all have their own things going on.

Some might be going through tough times
or struggling with something...

Some of them might come
with those feelings.

I want those people to think today
was the best day ever.

I want to put on a live that makes them feel warm
inside when they go home──

...You can do it.
If it's you, Chiyuki.
